title: PM, Punjab CM discuss overall situation of province
content:
LAHORE, Aug 25 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan and Chief Minister Punjab Usman Buzdar met in the provincial capital and discussed the overall situation.
The progress of development projects came under discussion, the PM Office said.
